evidence.claim: Docketwise utilizes AWS for cloud services.
Docketwise ensures HIPAA compliance for all transactions.
Docketwise integrates with Stripe for payment processing, ensuring high security in handling sensitive data.
Docketwise utilizes EDI X12 for client transaction sets.
Docketwise API documentation indicates the use of modern integration patterns.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of use for X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found.
